Job Posting:171201 - Position: F25 Software Development Intern (Konek) 171201B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 07/17/2025 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 07/07/2025 11:32 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Interac Corp. Suite 2400 - 200 Bay Street Toronto M5J 2J1 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Fall F25 Software Development Intern (Konek) 171201B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Software Developer Intern (Konek) At Interac, we design and deliver products and solutions that give Canadians control over their money so they can get more out of life. But that's not all. Whether we're leading real-time money movement, driving innovative commerce solutions like open payments for transit systems, or making advancements in new areas like verification and open banking, we are playing a key role in shaping the future of the digital economy in Canada. Want to make a lasting impact amongst a community of creative thinkers, problem solvers, technical gurus and high-performance application developers? We want to hear from you. Reporting to the Practice Leader, Development, as a Software Developer on our backend services team, you'll play a key role in building and enhancing the Konek platform - a critical part of Interac's product ecosystem. You'll be responsible for developing new features, improving existing functionality, and increasing unit test coverage to ensure high-quality, reliable software. This role offers a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and integrate AI into the development lifecycle. You'll help automate unit testing and code review processes using AI-powered tools, driving efficiency and consistency across the team. You'll be responsible for: • Working with lead and senior development leaders to understanding business requirements and translate them into design specifications and code • • Design, develop, and maintain backend services for the Konek application. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. • • • Enhance unit test coverage and ensure code quality through automated testing.- Leverage AI tools to streamline code reviews, identify bugs, and optimize performance. Participate in Agile ceremonies and contribute to sprint planning, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups. Continuously explore and adopt new technologies and best practices to improve development workflows. • You bring: • Currently completing an undergraduate degree from a creditable Canadian institution with a focus on computer science, software engineering, AI/Robotics or similar field Experience and understanding of programming languages, databases, code management tools and unit testing Proficiency in backend development using languages such as Java, Kotlin, or Node.js Experience with cloud platforms (preferably AWS) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) Familiarity with unit testing frameworks and CI/CD pipelines Interest or experience in using AI tools for development (e.g., code generation, static analysis, test automation) Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for learning and innovation A self-starter mindset with a drive for continuous learning - you have a natural ability to pick up new technology you enjoy solving problems while learning about new tools, technology, applications and how they work Confidence in your ability to communicate verbally and written in a detailed and impactful way Although not required, you have some familiarity or previous experience with the following: Prior co-op experience in similar roles is an asset (Full stack Developer, Software Development Intern) Understanding Agile methodologies and processes. Knowledge of Security in web platform such as WebAuthN, OAuth2 etc. Experience with devops tools and processes. Self-motivated to learn new technologies and applications. • • • • • • • • • • • • • • Excellent teamwork and collaboration skills along with strong analysis and problem-solving skills • Workstyle: Hybrid (3 days on-site) Location: Toronto Term: September to December 2025 Duration: Monday - Friday Interac requires employees to complete a background check that is completed by one of our service providers. We use this service to complete the following checks: • Canadian criminal record check; • Public safety verification; • Canadian ID cross-check; • 5-year employment verification; • Education verification; and • If applicable, Credit Inquiry and Social Media Check How we work We know that exceptional people have great ideas and are passionate about their work. Our culture encourages excellence and actively rewards contributions with: Connection: You're surrounded by talented people every day who are driven by their passion of a common goal. Core Values: They define us. Living them helps us be the best at what we do. Compensation & Benefits: Pay is driven by individual and corporate performance and we provide a multitude of benefits and perks. Education: To ensure you are the best at what you do we invest in you Please be aware of certain individuals fraudulently using Interac Corp.'s name and logo to offer fictitious employment opportunities. Interac Corp. will never ask, solicit, nor accept any monies in exchange for employment opportunities. Any such offers of employment are fraudulent and invalid, and you are strongly advised to exercise great caution and disregard such offers and invitations. Please note that under no circumstances shall Interac Corp. be held liable or responsible for any claims, losses, damages, expenses, or other inconveniences resulting from or in any way connected to the actions of individuals performing such fraud. Further, such fraudulent communication shall not be treated as any kind of offer or representation by Interac Corp. or its subsidiaries and affiliates. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
